nodes.text: The Sarisa-class gunship was an interstellar-range gunship model used by the Pyke Crime Syndicate during the Clone Wars.

During the Clone Wars, the spice smuggler organization known as the Pyke Syndicate used Sarisa-class gunships. The Pykes used gunships of this type for a trip to the moon of Zanbar, to join Darth Maul's Shadow Collective. Three of these ships were used to transport members of the Shadow Collective to Mandalore.
